title: Yvonne's perfume = Le Parfum d'Yvonne [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Patrice Leconte, Thierry Ganay, M.G. Films, Centre European Cinematographique Rhones-Alpes, Zoulou Films and Lambart Productions
brief_description: 1958, a resort hotel on Lake Geneva is the setting for this foray into romance, friendship and decadence. It is at the hotel that Victor meets Dr. Meinthe, a flamboyant homosexual, and Yvonne, a beautiful woman who captures them both. Together, the three of them embark on a summer experience like no other. Cast includes Jean-Pierre Marielle, Hippolyte Girardot and Sandra Majani. In French with English subtitles.
creator_credit_for_label: Patrice Leconte, Thierry Ganay, M.G. Films, Centre European Cinematographique Rhones-Alpes, Zoulou Films and Lambart Productions
